alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 2:52PM EST until January 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SUNDAY TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches with locally higher amounts in Rutland and Windsor counties. * WHERE...Orange, Western Rutland, Eastern Rutland, Western Windsor and Eastern Windsor Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Sunday to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to develop Sunday evening. The snow may be heavy at times, especially across southern Vermont during the early morning hours Monday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
